snippet.title: BattleCore Arena - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Here is a new BattleCore Arena trailer, enjoy! Let us know in the comments if you like it :)

BattleCore Arena is a multiplayer TPS in which you control spheres subjected to the laws of physics, and in which you have to eject your opponents from the arena in order to win. There is no need to reload your weapon, no unnecessary actions, the game is made to be dynamic, with fast and fluid motions, to focus on the essential aspects of a shooting game. All of that in a futuristic universe intended to be fun and surprising.

Battlecore Arena is already available on Windows through the Steam store, in Early Access.

Steam store page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/689570/
Official website: http://cosmicray-studio.com/projects.html
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BattleCoreArena/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BattleCoreArena
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/94f8rHb
